ROOT:
-- DaoT_Workflow_D3_Update -- 2014/7/18 日立 太郎 UPDATE [T_Workflow] SET
[WorkflowControlNo] = @Set_WorkflowControlNo_forUPD, [SubSystemId] = @Set_SubSystemId_forUPD, [WorkflowName] = @Set_WorkflowName_forUPD, [UserId] = @Set_UserId_forUPD, [UserInfo] = @Set_UserInfo_forUPD, [ReserveArea] = @Set_ReserveArea_forUPD, [StartDate] = @Set_StartDate_forUPD, [EndDate] = @Set_EndDate_forUPD,
WHERE AND [WorkflowControlNo] = @WorkflowControlNoAND [WorkflowControlNo] IS NULL AND [SubSystemId] = @SubSystemIdAND [SubSystemId] IS NULL AND [WorkflowName] = @WorkflowNameAND [WorkflowName] IS NULL AND [UserId] = @UserIdAND [UserId] IS NULL AND [UserInfo] = @UserInfoAND [UserInfo] IS NULL AND [ReserveArea] = @ReserveAreaAND [ReserveArea] IS NULL AND [StartDate] = @StartDateAND [StartDate] IS NULL AND [EndDate] = @EndDateAND [EndDate] IS NULL
